attributes.action: Put a no vote on every one of these petitions so if we think its a stupid idea we can say so
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Put a no vote on every one of these petitions so if we think its a stupid idea we can say so

rejection.details: Any comments about the e-petitioning system should be sent to team@petitions.pm.gov.uk.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
